reviews.name: KC Masterpiece Barbecue Seasoning, 6 Ounces
reviews.reviewText: Love this seasoning. Great price. The shipping took way to long. Not sure what happen to the instore delievery. It took a week to arrive and it costs $4.95. But the product is great. Love it on steak and ribs.
reviews.title: GProduct

reviews.name: KC Masterpiece Barbecue Seasoning, 6 Ounces
reviews.reviewText: This is my fav SECRET spice to all my fav dishes. Cant live w/o this stuff
reviews.title: LOVE

reviews.name: KC Masterpiece Barbecue Seasoning, 6 Ounces
reviews.title: only use this on all meats

reviews.name: KC Masterpiece Barbecue Seasoning, 6 Ounces
reviews.reviewText: I use it in everything especially potatoes
reviews.title: Best spice

reviews.name: KC Masterpiece Barbecue Seasoning, 6 Ounces
reviews.reviewText: KC MASTERPIECE IS MY FAVORITE BBQ SAUCE. BUT THIS DOESN'T TASTE LIKE KC. IT'S A NICE FLAVOR. YOU HAVE TO SALT HEAVY TO GET THE KC TANG. I'LL GO BACK TO THE SAUCE INSTEAD OF THIS SEASONING SALT. I DID PREFER THIS KC SEASONING ON MY STEAK OVER ALL THE STEAK SEASONINGS I'VE TRIED OVER THE YEARS. AND IT'S TASTY ON PORK. BUT IT DOES NOT COMPARE TO AND IS NOT EQUAL TO THE KC MASTERPIECE BBQ SAUCE IN THE BOTTLE.
reviews.title: FAIR TO MIDLAND
